sentences.en: Gu Yanwu is a famous thinker, and he regards himself as adherent of the Ming Dynasty.
sentences.cn: 顾炎武是明末清初著名的思想家, 他以遗民自居,且积极地反清复明,拒不入仕.

sentences.en: He is an adherent of the philosophy of nonviolence.

sentences.en: Rip's sole domestic adherent was his dog Wolf, who was as much hen - pecked as his master.
sentences.cn: 在家里,瑞普的唯一知己就是那条名叫“狼”的狗,“狼”和他主人一样怕女主人.
